31.en: How to Create Posters with this Template

32.en: How to Create Posters with this Template

33.en: This template is for creating posters. You add pages that contain only a picture. Then you add text boxes to the page by right-clicking on the image and choosing "Add Text Box to Image":

41.en: Type words into the box. If the box is not big enough, use the mouse to change the size of the box. You can also move the box around the page with the mouse.

42.en: Type words into the box. If the box is not big enough, use the mouse to change the size of the box. You can also move the box around the page with the mouse.

43.en: Type words into the box. If the box is not big enough, use the mouse to change the size of the box. You can also move the box around the page with the mouse.

50.jra: Rao nanao bĕ tơngan ih hăng čơƀu hăng ia ƀôdah rao gơñu hăng ia alkol rao sut.
50.en: Wash your hands regularly with soap and water, or clean them with alcohol-based hand rub.

51.jra: Rao nanao bĕ tơngan ih hăng čơƀu hăng ia ƀôdah rao gơñu hăng ia alkol rao sut.
51.en: Wash your hands regularly with soap and water, or clean them with alcohol-based hand rub.

56.jra: Anăm tĕk kơñir mơta, adŭng laih anŭn amăng bah ôh.
56.en: Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.

57.jra: Anăm tĕk kơñir mơta, adŭng laih anŭn amăng bah ôh.
57.en: Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.

60.jra: Pơpĕ Đuaĭ Hĭ Bĕ Mơ̆ng Kôwid-19

61.jra: Pơpĕ Đuaĭ Hĭ Bĕ Mơ̆ng Kôwid-19

66.jra: Dŏ ataih bĕ hăng tơdruă kơplăh wăh 2 med ƀôdah 6 plă̱.
66.en: Maintain 2 meters distance between yourself and others.

67.jra: Dŏ ataih bĕ hăng tơdruă kơplăh wăh 2 med ƀôdah 6 plă̱.
67.en: Maintain 2 meters distance between yourself and others.

68.jra: Troă bĕ bơnăl go̱m hăng mơnuih lu.

69.jra: Troă bĕ bơnăl go̱m hăng mơnuih lu.

74.jra: Dŏ kơčăng hơmư̆ tŭ pơthâo nanao kơ tơlơi pơthâo phrâo kơ tơlơi KÔWID-19. Ngă tui bĕ tơlơi ƀing nai pơjrao djru pơmĭn pơthâo brơi.
74.en: Stay informed on the latest developments about COVID-19. Follow advice given by your healthcare provider.

75.jra: Dŏ kơčăng hơmư̆ tŭ pơthâo nanao kơ tơlơi pơthâo phrâo kơ tơlơi KÔWID-19. Ngă tui bĕ tơlơi ƀing nai pơjrao djru pơmĭn pơthâo brơi.
75.en: Stay informed on the latest developments about COVID-19. Follow advice given by your healthcare provider.

82.jra: Go̱m bĕ amăng bah hăng adŭng ih hăng ke̱ng tơngan ih ƀôdah hăng hla ar tơdang pơtŭk ƀôdah phañ. Glŏm hĭ hla ar sut anŭn mơtam bĕ.
82.en: Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Dispose of the used tissue immediately.

83.jra: Go̱m bĕ amăng bah hăng adŭng ih hăng ke̱ng tơngan ih ƀôdah hăng hla ar tơdang pơtŭk ƀôdah phañ. Glŏm hĭ hla ar sut anŭn mơtam bĕ.
83.en: Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Dispose of the used tissue immediately.

90.jra: Dŏ sang tơdah ih pơmưn ƀu hiam drơi jan. Tơdah ih duăm, pơtŭk laih anŭn tơnap suă jua, hơduah arăng djru brơi jrao tañ bĕ.
90.en: Stay home if you feel unwell. If you have fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early.

91.jra: Dŏ sang tơdah ih pơmưn ƀu hiam drơi jan. Tơdah ih duăm, pơtŭk laih anŭn tơnap suă jua, hơduah arăng djru brơi jrao tañ bĕ.
91.en: Stay home if you feel unwell. If you have fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early.
